com.mindfusion.charting

Class Plot

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mindfusion.charting.components.Component
      • com.mindfusion.charting.Plot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.mindfusion.charting.components.RootControl, DataChangedListener, SeriesContainer, com.mindfusion.common.ObservableListListener<SeriesRenderer>, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Plot2D, PolarPlot

    public class Plot
extends com.mindfusion.charting.components.Component
implements SeriesContainer, com.mindfusion.common.ObservableListListener<SeriesRenderer>, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, DataChangedListener
    The base class for components used to draw chart graphics.
